content: Cheese can come in various colors, but it is most commonly seen in shades of yellow, white, and orange. The color of cheese can vary depending on factors such as the type of cheese, the animal's diet, and the addition of natural or artificial coloring agents.
what color does cheese normally have

Cheese normally has a yellow or yellowish-white color. The yellow color in cheese typically comes from the natural pigments present in the milk fat. However, there are also many white cheeses available, which do not contain these pigments. The exact color of cheese can vary based on factors such as the type of cheese, aging process, and ingredients used.
